thread.title: Ryan Giggs has cosy dinner with Emmerdale star Gemma Atkinson just hours after High Court battle with ex Stacey revealed
thread.title_full: Ryan Giggs has cosy dinner with Emmerdale star Gemma Atkinson just hours after High Court battle with ex Stacey revealed

author: mhiggins
title: Ryan Giggs has cosy dinner with Emmerdale star Gemma Atkinson just hours after High Court battle with ex Stacey revealed
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments RYAN Giggs cosied up to soap actress Gemma Atkinson just hours after a High Court battle with his estranged wife was revealed. 
The ex-Manchester United ace, 43, treated Emmerdale star Gemma, 32, to a meal at George’s Dining Room and Bar in Manchester. Getty Images - WireImage Ryan Giggs enjoyed dinner with Emmerdale actress Gemma Atkinson amid his divorce battle with ex Stacey Fortitude Press 3 An onlooker said Ryan seemed ‘very impressed’ by the soap beauty 
Their date came as it emerged he was battling ex Stacey, 38, over the financial details of their divorce . 
An onlooker said Ryan did not appear to be letting his problems get him down. 
He said: “Gemma was wearing an elegant strappy top on with her hair put up and Ryan seemed very impressed. 
He kept sneaking glances at her… There was definitely a spark there 
“He kept sneaking glances at her. 
“He looked like he was enjoying himself, certainly not a man with the weight of the world on his shoulders. 
“There was definitely a spark there. Times Newspapers Ltd United fan Gemma used to date Ryan’s former team-mate Cristiano Ronaldo Ryan Giggs reluctantly tries snapchat for the first time and gets changed into a deer RELATED STORIES 'ARE YOU ALWAYS LIKE THIS?!' Keith Lemon and Dennis Rodman have the most awkward interview EVER on Through the Keyhole A BIG MISSE Real Housewives of Cheshire beauty Misse Beqiri quits ITV show to spend time with Towie boyfriend DREAM LOVER Mariah Carey confirms Bryan Tanaka is her boyfriend but insists the pair will keep their romance private MOFFATT NO MORE Scarlett Moffatt's parents Mark and Betty are ‘dropped’ from Gogglebox and won't appear in next series NO PAYNE NO GAIN Liam Payne to have mansion renovated ahead of arrival of first child with Cheryl next month LONDON CORR-ING Hailey Baldwin flaunts her cleavage as she touches down in the UK for London Fashion Week COLEEN BREAK Coleen Rooney axed by fashion giant Littlewoods in favour of 'down to earth' Myleene Klass ‘CALL ME LINDA J’ The Voice fans claim Bolton’s Linda Jennings is the spitting image of X Factor star Honey G 'I'M STILL PRETTY' Aaron Carter claims he was attacked on stage by member of support act after ‘making racist comment’ Drive through Iron Sun are the latest band to be voted off Let It Shine in the tense live semi final Bums the word Boxer Conor McGregor insists calling Khloe Kardashian's bottom 'fat' was meant to be a compliment SAVING THE PENNIES? Kendall Jenner hunts for bargains round Notting Hill market as she hits the capital for London Fashion Week 
"They gave each other their undivided attention, and kept leaning across the table to get closer." 
Gemma is a die-hard United fan who has previously dated Ryan’s former Old Trafford team-mate Cristiano Ronaldo. 
Neither Ryan nor Stacey was in the High Court yesterday as a judge considered their case.
